results.content:
and my wife( 61) Visited these waterfalls on the 21 November. Though my wife recently underwent total.knee replacement , still we set out for Araku and as part of it, this place. Lovely , gushing water from the rocks, nice cascading effect. The steps are not very steep. However, senior citizens( we too are) have to go slow. I climbed down all the steps ( about 100) and reached a bridge. From there,the waterfalls provide an awesome sight.
